item.title: Quick update since August
item.description: It has been 3 months. And before that it had been 2. I’m sure not updating this as much as I’d like to, but it seems that when I have the time, I don’t have the energy, and when I have the energy, I don’t have the time, and when I do have both, I just don’t know what to say. I finished my studying for CompTIA CySA+ back in September and have plenty of notes that I plan to turn into posts.
